Initial.title: Locha Mesh
Initial.subtitle: Thank you for using Locha Mesh, is a radio network for communications and Bitcoin transactions without internet or even power grid. We are working not only in a protocol, but also the firmware for affordable devices like the Turpial or Harpia.
Initial.text: Do you want to create a new account or restore a previously used account?
Initial.subTitleCreateAccount: You'll need to save your backup phrase in case this app deleted
Initial.subTitleCorfirm: Confirm your words to continue the process of creating an account
Initial.subtitlePin: It is very important that you remember the pin entered, with it you will have access to your account.
Initial.subtitlePin2: Enter your pin to access your account
Initial.error2: It is mandatory to fill in all fields
Initial.error3: the words don't match check them I've tried again
Initial.subtitleRestore: restore account with words, it is very important that you enter the words correctly, otherwise your account will not be restored with the same uid

Settings.name: Name
Settings.qrText: Scan the QR code to add as a contact
Settings.textBackup: Enter your pin code to continue

Contacts.name: contact name
Contacts.existName: there is already a contact with that name

Chats.deleteBody: Are you sure you delete all messages?
